# totalDiskSpaceCapacity

**Instance Property**

The total disk space capacity of the current device.

## Declaration

```swift
var totalDiskSpaceCapacity: Measurement<UnitInformationStorage> { get }
```

## Discussion

You can calulate the amount of free space on this device by subtracting [doc://com.apple.metrickit/documentation/MetricKit/MXDiskSpaceUsageMetric/totalDiskSpaceUsedSize] from this value.

## Reading disk capacity and space

- **totalDiskSpaceUsedSize**: The total amount of used disk storage on the current device.
